name: La Fabrique du Vivant
description:
Judicaelle and Alterisateur visited the exhibition La Fabrique du Vivant at the Centre Pompidou in Paris.
As they walked by art pieces and listened to the guide, they wondered if somehow this beautiful living mycelium chair could fill its primal function : sustain a living human body. Of course, they were not allowed to make this experimentation in real life. 

Thus, here is their reproduction of the museum.
